properties.name: output.csv.path
properties.description: The relative or absolute location of the CSV file

properties.name: output.csv.filename
properties.description: The filename of the CSV output file

properties.name: output.csv.delimiter
properties.description: The column separator to use in the CSV file

properties.name: output.csv.quote
properties.description: The quote character to surround column values with, can be empty.

properties.name: output.csv.enable
properties.description: Set to true to enable the CSV file output.

properties.name: input.period
properties.description: The refresh rate for fetching data from devices in seconds.

properties.name: input.devices
properties.description: The list of all devices to fetch and collect data from.

properties.name: input.timeout
properties.description: The HTTP connection timeout in seconds when fetching data from a device

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.hosts
properties.description: List of Elasticsearch hosts in the cluster

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.username
properties.description: An optional username to authenticate to Elasticsearch if required

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.password
properties.description: An optional password when authentication for Elasticsearch service is required

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.worker
properties.description: Number of parallel workers when accessing Elasticsearch

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.index
properties.description: Name of the index to use for storing data. Default is 'meterbeat'

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.path
properties.description: The path in the URL to the Elasticsearch root, default is empty

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.max_retries
properties.description: Number of retries when network connections are faulty. Default is 3 retries

properties.name: output.elasticsearch.timeout
properties.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a network connection, and if successful, to send data to the Elasticsearch service
